mention.text: Hillary Just Vowed To Never Utter These
the 11.7 million undocumented immigrants in this country
a senator to spend money to build a barrier to try to prevent illegal immigrants from coming in
the people at the heart of this issue
those of us who believe people ought to come to this country legally
the son of an immigrant who came legally from Cuba to seek the American dream
